name: English
entity.evil_cube.description: A monolith of retired grandparents mindlessly pressing away at slots. When killed once, will become smaller and attempt to @ground pound@ instead of attack.
entity.robot.description: A digital copy of yourself, designed for maximum effeciency combat against intruders in all the same ways they; you; would attack.
entity.rat.description: A rat living within the casino's walls with a concerning amount of `children.`
menu.controllerWarning: Want to use a controller as the only player? Enable "No Keyboard" In the settings!
menu.itchWarning: Itch's default fullscreen button is broken. Use "O" to fullscreen at any time.
hint.weaponRequired: Get a weapon at the Wheel Of Fortune!
area.gamblezone.description:
`Return here to heal to full health, but will remove your combo!`
Gamble away all your earned @tokens@ for new @weapons@ and @attributes@!

|*The GambleZone is not responsible for potential health loss, newly created handicaps, enlargement, the breaking of kneecaps, etc.|
entity.scrimblo.side_warning: Attempting Unsafe Reboot... Firmware has not been updated for "831,931,348" days. Please consult a system administrator on more information on how to resolve this issue.
entity.scrimblo.dialouge.1: Well, uh... Welcome to the Gold Star Casino!
entity.scrimblo.dialouge.2: I am Scrimblo, My purpose here is to Serve you for your convenience.
entity.scrimblo.dialouge.3: You must be new here, no? Well, have I got a gift for you!
entity.scrimblo.dialouge.4: Here is your special Gold Star™ Beer Bottle
entity.scrimblo.dialouge.6: Or if you want some range, throw it around the Casino with %(altFire)...
entity.scrimblo.dialouge.6.side: It's not like there are Janitors anymore.
entity.scrimblo.dialouge.7: You seem to be having fun with that.
entity.scrimblo.dialouge.8: Well, maybe that means you'll enjoy this Gold Star Casino™ Gamble-volver!
entity.scrimblo.dialouge.11: Since Gold Star Casino™ opened in 1329,
entity.scrimblo.dialouge.12: The rules have stated that all customers need to pay 100 dollars weekly for a card to enter the Casino!
entity.scrimblo.dialouge.14: Please leave the premises or purchase a Gold Card, all non authorized customers will be kicked out with force!
options.controls.keyboard:
Right Click (Unselected) to Clear Inputs
Escape to leave recording
options.controls.controller:
Start (Unselected) to Clear Inputs
Start to leave recording
